import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function LightbulbIcon(props) { return ( ); } function CheckIcon(props) { return ( ); } function FastForwardIcon(props) { return ( ); } function DoorOpenIcon(props) { return ( ); } function BadgeAlertIcon(props) { return ( ); } function App() { const [lights, setLights] = useState({ lobby: false, warehouse: false, exterior: false, offices: false }); const [peopleCount, setPeopleCount] = useState(0); const [isConveyorMoving, setConveyorMoving] = useState(false); const [isGateOpen, setGateOpen] = useState(false); const [isAlarmActive, setAlarmActive] = useState(false); const toggleLight = (area) => { setLights(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [area]: !prevState[area] })); }; const toggleGate = () => { setGateOpen(prevState => !prevState); }; const toggleAlarm = () => { setAlarmActive(prevState => !prevState); }; return (

Control de Establecimiento

Control de Luces

toggleLight('lobby')} />
toggleLight('warehouse')} />
toggleLight('offices')} />
toggleLight('exterior')} />

Conteo de Personas

Total: {peopleCount}

Banda Transportadora

setConveyorMoving(prevState => !prevState)} />

Estado: {isConveyorMoving ? 'En Movimiento' : 'Detenida'}

Control de Puerta

Estado: {isGateOpen ? 'Abierta' : 'Cerrada'}

Alarma Perimetral

Estado: {isAlarmActive ? 'Activada' : 'Desactivada'}

); } export default App;
